channel.title: New Skillcape Models
channel.description:
I was looking through the models of current RuneScape and found these within there. Thoughts and opinions on the new look? Personally, I like them and it's about time they upgraded them; they've had the old skill icons since 474 I believe. If you couldn't figure it out, the green boxes are where the skill icons are going.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hWmerFQ.png[/img]

item.title: New Skillcape Models
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“ox random xi, post:37, topic:509429”][quote author=3lv3n snip3r link=topic=627672.msg4268573#msg4268573 date=1364333435]

Doesn’t look bad, although the 2nd and last capes look too similar.

Runecrafting is the second one and Prayer is the last one. If you look carefully, you can spot the difference of the trim colors.
[/quote]
you shouldn’t have to though[/quote]
The current capes are similar as well. The only way to distinctively tell them apart is the skill icon. Because they’re using the same colors as the current capes.

Read full topic

Runecrafting is the second one and Prayer is the last one. If you look carefully, you can spot the difference of the trim colors.

item.title: New Skillcape Models
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:31, topic:509429”][quote author=3lv3n snip3r link=topic=627672.msg4267715#msg4267715 date=1364241811]

put somebody on fire? troll us by making it so you put your own self on fire? perhaps the ability to control fire? they could at least be creative.

Spontaneously making fire appear in your hands by snapping isn’t controlling fire?
[/quote]
Exactly^.
Maybe they could make it so a person can fly off using fire, or something.[/quote]
If they do redo the emotes, I’m sure they will look cooler.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Cruel_Truth Cruel Truth
item.description:
@Cruel_Truth wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:28, topic:509429”][quote author=3lv3n snip3r link=topic=627672.msg4267272#msg4267272 date=1364181327]

nah mane it sposed 2 trow rocks up in are and shoot dem b4 dey fall 2 groundse. u kno, pul out an macheen gun and shoot a few rounds at de faleeng roks b4 dey fall? u get me bro or want me 2 restate wat I sed.
[/quote]restate it m8

I hope to god they don’t redo the emotes too. They will probably ruin a good majority of them. It really pissed me off when they changed the HP emote right after I got the cape -.-

Jagex is actually pretty good with making emotes. Especially with using particles.

I remember they updated the fm one. It’s still lame, but what can you do with such a dry skill…[/quote]put somebody on fire? troll us by making it so you put your own self on fire? perhaps the ability to control fire? they could at least be creative.
